definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: Travelling just 60 miles drive from the capital, Kinshasa, can take about eight hours.
sentences.chinese: 從首都金沙薩開出僅僅60英里，就要耗時八小時。

sentences.english: My brother lives in Kinshasa where he is a trader.
sentences.chinese: 我有個兄弟，他住在金沙薩，是個生意人。

sentences.english: As I found out, nearly everyone in Kinshasa loves the Sapeurs.
sentences.chinese: 而且我發現，金沙薩的幾乎每個人都愛老六。
